message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1,200,000. This is a significant investment, but I believe its value to you will be well worth the price. Let's discuss this further.

Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $950,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm not able to accept $950,000 at this time.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This is a fair price considering the value you've indicated the product holds for you. I believe it's a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000 for your product. I believe this aligns closely with the value I perceive in the item, and I hope this proposal will lead to a mutually beneficial agreement.
